title: S17 Ep82: Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals/717 Edition
itunes:title: Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals/717 Edition
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Ripped From The Headlines/Dumb Crimes/Stupid Criminals/ 717 Edition with Beer City Bruiser!

With the world and it's media being focused on just a few topics, we dig up the true crime topics that everyone is either talking about online, or you might have missed altogether!

Tim and Bruiser talk about the death of a beloved cast member of The Sopranos, A man in Wyoming kills and attempts to dismember a man who tried to rape his girlfriend, TWO people kill people and try to get away with it by burying them on their property, and there was a second attempted mass shooting on July 4th that was thwarted by a hero citizen in Richmond, Virginia, and we'll tell you all about it!

PLUS DUMB CRIMES AND STUPID CRIMINALS!!

Check out where Beer City Bruiser will be in your area:  https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
